name: glutton man
description: A minimalist style, flying barrage game. The glutton played by the player is almost invincible when facing enemies. It can not only ignore the majority of attack,but also swallow the enemy's bullets to strengthen itself. But this does not mean that players can crush everything.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel® Core™ Duo or better Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000 or better Storage: 150 MB available space
